channel.title: CVE Feed for Qognify -- NiceVision
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Qognify -- NiceVision

item.title: CVE-2023-2306|2024-08-02T06:19:14.612Z -- qognify -- nicevision
item.description: Qognify NiceVision versions 3.1 and prior are vulnerable to exposing sensitive information using hard-coded credentials. With these credentials an attacker can retrieve information about the cameras, user information, and modify database records.
